reviews.customers_say: Customers find the lingerie set's fabric soft and describe it as suitably sexy. Moreover, the overall quality receives positive feedback. However, the fit and flattering aspects get mixed reactions from customers.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks and fits great!
items.body: I am 6' tall, 175 pounds, athletic build, 36DD, and the L fit me perfectly both in waist/bottoms and bra fit. It is very flattering, does not feel cheaply made, and I will be purchasing in different colors. I do work out alot and do not have much of a pooch, but I did have a c-section back in 2019 - however, the slightly higher raise on this set covers up any insecurity I may have around that area almost as if it doesn't exist, very flattering and pretty, and good for the price. Read more
items.author: A. Landers

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sexy set!
items.body: This fits very true to size. The panties stay in place without rising up. The bra give a tiny bit of lift. Read more
items.author: Mindy DeMarco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect set! ðŸ˜ðŸ˜
items.body: This set is so soft and feels expensive! I love everything about it! Sizing was perfect and right on par with my normal sizing. I chose the wine red color and it is gorgeous! Overall quality is great so far and I canâ€™t wait to buy the other colors! Read more
items.author: Tim Hawthor

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Its super cute but I wish I could order separate sizing for the top and bottom. The girls are smaller but I have a big booty so the bottoms didnt fit so I had to return. Read more
items.author: Jamie O.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Suitably sexy!
items.body: I loved this! It gave the necessary coverage while still making me feel sexy! Overall win. Iâ€™m 62 inches and about 160. I have a little tummy which the panties flattered. The fit was overall comfy and I purchased a size large. I have a 36DD and the top looked nice, not a lot of tummy coverage with the top but I didnâ€™t mind. Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy
items.body: Great quality and it fit perfect. Read more
items.author: Mymy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad quality.
items.body: Bad quality. Literally the ones you get for a dollar in a Chinese store Read more
items.author: Alex Hernandez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True Green
items.body: The fabric is so soft, comfortable, and breathable. Washed once already and didnâ€™t shrink or fad. I hung them to dry. Amazing, will definitely be getting more sets in other colors Read more
items.author: Dana

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
